translationtableentry.text: L'inespugnabile Numanzia è diventata, all'interno della penisola iberica, il nucleo della resistenza contro Roma.\nDopo 20 anni di insuccessi, il Senato affida a Scipione l'Emiliano l'incarico di sottomettere definitivamente la roccaforte ribelle.\nIl generale romano mette la città sotto assedio...
translationtableentry.result: The Iberians have rebelled against the Roman authority.\nTo prevent them from succeeding in their efforts to become a breakaway province Rome has sent Scipio Aemilianus to capture their stronghold Numantia and put an end to their uprising.\nThe Roman general besieges the Iberian city...

translationtableentry.text: La inexpugnable Numancia se ha convertido en el refugio de la resistencia frente a Roma en la península Ibérica.\nTras 20 años de fracasos, el Senado encomienda a Escipión Emiliano la misión de someter definitivamente la plaza rebelde.\nEl general romano pone sitio a la ciudad...
translationtableentry.result: The Iberians have rebelled against the Roman authority.\nTo prevent them from succeeding in their efforts to become a breakaway province Rome has sent Scipio Aemilianus to capture their stronghold Numantia and put an end to their uprising.\nThe Roman general besieges the Iberian city...
